.. _wx.TextFileType:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.TextFileType**
==========================================================================================================================================



The `TextFileType` enumeration provides the following values:



================================================================================ ================================================================================
**Description**                                                                  **Value**
================================================================================ ================================================================================
TextFileType_None                                                                incomplete (the last line of the file only)                      
TextFileType_Unix                                                                line is terminated with '``LF``' = 0xA = 10 = '\\n'                      
TextFileType_Dos                                                                 line is terminated with '``CR``' '``LF``'                      
TextFileType_Mac                                                                 line is terminated with '``CR``' = 0xD = 13 = '\\r'                      
TextFileType_Os2                                                                 line is terminated with '``CR``' '``LF``'                      
================================================================================ ================================================================================

|
